= Whats new in Javascript Parser 3 =
  # Find feature. (supports hotkey)
     http://js-addin.googlecode.com/svn/site/screen_FindExample.png <br/>
     To configure hotkey please use Visual Studio hotkey manager.<br/>
     Navigate Tools/Options/Environment/Keyboard and do search for command
     "*!JavascriptParser.Find*" for VS2010 or "*JSparser.Connect.Find*" for VS2008. <br/>
     Then specify your hotkey. By default it should be Shift+Alt+J.<br/>
     http://js-addin.googlecode.com/svn/site/screen_define_shortcut.png<br/>
  # Show line numbers in tree.
